label: NPG 668: Anne Boleyn

metadata.label: Date-Made
metadata.value: late 16th century, based on a work of circa 1533-1536

description: Anne Boleyn This painting is probably based on a contemporary portrait which no longer survives. Boleyn was described as having a long neck, wide mouth and with 'eyes which were black and beautiful'. This portrait has recently undergone structural conservation following a successful fundraising campaign and the generous support of public donations.
